comments.comment: I believe this issue is no longer applicable after the v0.6 release. Closing, but feel free to reopen or open a new issue if you run into any similar problems in the future.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
